models

Class RecordGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Model
      • models.RecordGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonSerializable

    public class RecordGroup
extends Model
    data model for record groups. The "group" of a record determines where it is located in the tree of records.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<RecordGroup> children
      list of children of this group.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> contents
      all MIDATA content names that are in this group (if group has no children)
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> label
      the public label that should be shown in the frontend (map from language to label)
      java.lang.String name
      the internal name of this group
      java.lang.String parent
      the internal name of the parent of this group.
      java.lang.String system
      the name of the group system this group belongs to

      • Fields inherited from class models.Model

        _id

    • Field Detail

      • system

        public java.lang.String system
        the name of the group system this group belongs to

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        the internal name of this group

      • label

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> label
        the public label that should be shown in the frontend (map from language to label)

      • parent

        public java.lang.String parent
        the internal name of the parent of this group. This information is used to build the tree.

      • contents

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> contents
        all MIDATA content names that are in this group (if group has no children)

      • children

        public java.util.List<RecordGroup> children
        list of children of this group. The list is derived from the parent field.
